lru-type.name: PDA
lru-type.description: PDA is used to amplify and split the fiber optic output of Central Reference Distributor

assembly-type.name: PDA
assembly-type.description: PDA is used to amplify and split the fiber optic output of Central Reference Distributor

baci-property.description: Return the module configuration and status

monitor-point.description: Return the module configuration and status

baci-property.description: Bit 0: Module operating mode status (0 Operative, 1 Standby)

monitor-point.description: Bit 0: Module operating mode status (0 Operative, 1 Standby)

baci-property.description: Bit 1: Automatic laser shutdown enable status (0 Disable, 1 Enable)

monitor-point.description: Bit 1: Automatic laser shutdown enable status (0 Disable, 1 Enable)

baci-property.description: Bit 2: Input power LOS alarm status (0 OK, 1 Error)

monitor-point.description: Bit 2: Input power LOS alarm status (0 OK, 1 Error)

baci-property.description: Bit 3: Output power LOS alarm status (0 OK, 1 Error)

monitor-point.description: Bit 3: Output power LOS alarm status (0 OK, 1 Error)

baci-property.description: Bit 4:EDFA unit overtemperature alarm status (0 OK, 1 Error)

monitor-point.description: Bit 4:EDFA unit overtemperature alarm status (0 OK, 1 Error)

baci-property.description: Bit 5: Pump laser diodes overtemperature alarm status (0 OK, 1 Error)

monitor-point.description: Bit 5: Pump laser diodes overtemperature alarm status (0 OK, 1 Error)

baci-property.description: Bit 6: Fault status (0 OK, 1 fault)

monitor-point.description: Bit 6: Fault status (0 OK, 1 fault)

baci-property.description: Bit 7:Interlock status (0 interlock closed,1 interlock open)

monitor-point.description: Bit 7:Interlock status (0 interlock closed,1 interlock open)

baci-property.description: 0 = command buffer status okay, 1 = command buffer overrun. Reset required.

monitor-point.description: 0 = command buffer status okay, 1 = command buffer overrun. Reset required.

baci-property.description: Number of command requests currently in buffer.

monitor-point.description: Number of command requests currently in buffer.

baci-property.description: Returns the power detected at the EDFA input, in dBm . If the value is not in range, the input LOS alarm will be active

monitor-point.description: Returns the power detected at the EDFA input, in dBm . If the value is not in range, the input LOS alarm will be active

baci-property.description: Returns the power detected at the EDFA output, in dBm . If the value is not in range, the input LOS alarm will be active.

monitor-point.description: Returns the power detected at the EDFA output, in dBm . If the value is not in range, the input LOS alarm will be active.

baci-property.description: Gets the EDFA stage temperature

monitor-point.description: Gets the EDFA stage temperature

baci-property.description: Get the EDFA passive fiber module temperature.

monitor-point.description: Get the EDFA passive fiber module temperature.

baci-property.description: Return the EDFA mode setting (two bits) (00 constant current mode default {CC} , 01 constant output power mode {CP},10 constant gain mode {GC}, 11 OFF)

monitor-point.description: Return the EDFA mode setting (two bits) (00 constant current mode default {CC} , 01 constant output power mode {CP},10 constant gain mode {GC}, 11 OFF)

baci-property.description: Return the EDFA output power setting, in dBm (only valid when EDFA mode is constant power (CP)

monitor-point.description: Return the EDFA output power setting, in dBm (only valid when EDFA mode is constant power (CP)

baci-property.description: Return the input LOS alarm trigger threshold setting, in dBm

monitor-point.description: Return the input LOS alarm trigger threshold setting, in dBm

baci-property.description: Return the output LOS alarm trigger threshold setting, in dBm

monitor-point.description: Return the output LOS alarm trigger threshold setting, in dBm

baci-property.description: Returns the input switch active port.

monitor-point.description: Returns the input switch active port.

baci-property.description: Return the diode current alarm status of all pump laser diodes. A laser diode is disabled and the alarm bit set automatically if the current it was set to goes out of range

monitor-point.description: Return the diode current alarm status of all pump laser diodes. A laser diode is disabled and the alarm bit set automatically if the current it was set to goes out of range

baci-property.description: Monitors the current in the specified pump laser diode. If the diode temperature alarm is active, the current drive is automatically disabled, and a value of 0 is returned

monitor-point.description: Monitors the current in the specified pump laser diode. If the diode temperature alarm is active, the current drive is automatically disabled, and a value of 0 is returned

baci-property.description: Monitors the current in the specified pump laser diode. If the diode temperature alarm is active, the current drive is automatically disabled, and a value of 0 is returned

monitor-point.description: Monitors the current in the specified pump laser diode. If the diode temperature alarm is active, the current drive is automatically disabled, and a value of 0 is returned

baci-property.description: Monitors the current in the specified pump laser diode. If the diode temperature alarm is active, the current drive is automatically disabled, and a value of 0 is returned

monitor-point.description: Monitors the current in the specified pump laser diode. If the diode temperature alarm is active, the current drive is automatically disabled, and a value of 0 is returned

baci-property.description: Monitors the current in the specified pump laser diode. If the diode temperature alarm is active, the current drive is automatically disabled, and a value of 0 is returned

monitor-point.description: Monitors the current in the specified pump laser diode. If the diode temperature alarm is active, the current drive is automatically disabled, and a value of 0 is returned

baci-property.description: Return the temperature alarm status of all the pump laser diodes. The laser diode is disabled automatically if its temperature is out of range

monitor-point.description: Return the temperature alarm status of all the pump laser diodes. The laser diode is disabled automatically if its temperature is out of range

baci-property.description: Return the temperature of the specified point number

monitor-point.description: Return the temperature of the specified point number

baci-property.description: Return the temperature of the specified point number

monitor-point.description: Return the temperature of the specified point number

baci-property.description: Return the temperature of the specified point number

monitor-point.description: Return the temperature of the specified point number

baci-property.description: Monitors the output power in milliwatts (mW) from the specified pump laser diode

monitor-point.description: Monitors the output power in milliwatts (mW) from the specified pump laser diode

baci-property.description: Monitors the output power in milliwatts (mW) from the specified pump laser diode

monitor-point.description: Monitors the output power in milliwatts (mW) from the specified pump laser diode

baci-property.description: Monitors the output power in milliwatts (mW) from the specified pump laser diode

monitor-point.description: Monitors the output power in milliwatts (mW) from the specified pump laser diode

baci-property.description: Returns the Configuration Item Number (CIN) for the FDMC module. Byte 0 (11) - ubyte for first level of the LRU CIN, byte 1 (22) - ubyte for second level of the LRU CIN, byte 2 (33) - ubyte for third level of the LRU CIN, byte 3 (44) - ubyte for forth level of the LRU CIN.

monitor-point.description: Returns the Configuration Item Number (CIN) for the FDMC module. Byte 0 (11) - ubyte for first level of the LRU CIN, byte 1 (22) - ubyte for second level of the LRU CIN, byte 2 (33) - ubyte for third level of the LRU CIN, byte 3 (44) - ubyte for forth level of the LRU CIN.

baci-property.description: Returns the date and the Perforce (backend repository software) version of the firmware. If no perforce version of firmware exists, 0x00 is returned for that byte. Byte 0 - ubyte representing the firmware revision month, byte 1 - ubyte representing the firmware revision day, byte 2 - ubyte representing that last two digits of the firmware revision year, byte 3 - ubyte representing the Perforce version of the firmware.

monitor-point.description: Returns the date and the Perforce (backend repository software) version of the firmware. If no perforce version of firmware exists, 0x00 is returned for that byte. Byte 0 - ubyte representing the firmware revision month, byte 1 - ubyte representing the firmware revision day, byte 2 - ubyte representing that last two digits of the firmware revision year, byte 3 - ubyte representing the Perforce version of the firmware.

baci-property.description: Monitors the current being used by the peltier to cool the laser diode

monitor-point.description: Monitors the current being used by the peltier to cool the laser diode

baci-property.description: Monitors the current being used by the peltier to cool the laser diode

monitor-point.description: Monitors the current being used by the peltier to cool the laser diode

baci-property.description: Monitors the current being used by the peltier to cool the laser diode

monitor-point.description: Monitors the current being used by the peltier to cool the laser diode

baci-property.description: Returns the Configuration Item Number (CIN) for the device with which the FDMC is communicating. Byte 0 (11) - ubyte for first level of the Device CIN, byte 1 (22) - ubyte for second level of the Device CIN, byte 2 (33) - ubyte for third level of the Device CIN, byte 3 (44) - ubyte for forth level of the Device CIN. LFRD should return 56.06.00.00, MLD should return 56.07.00.00, PRD should return 56.08.00.00.

monitor-point.description: Returns the Configuration Item Number (CIN) for the device with which the FDMC is communicating. Byte 0 (11) - ubyte for first level of the Device CIN, byte 1 (22) - ubyte for second level of the Device CIN, byte 2 (33) - ubyte for third level of the Device CIN, byte 3 (44) - ubyte for forth level of the Device CIN. LFRD should return 56.06.00.00, MLD should return 56.07.00.00, PRD should return 56.08.00.00.

baci-property.description: Returns the vendor assigned serial number of the amplifier.

monitor-point.description: Returns the vendor assigned serial number of the amplifier.

baci-property.description: Returns the vendor assigned software version number of the amplifier.

monitor-point.description: Returns the vendor assigned software version number of the amplifier.

baci-property.description: Generic Monitor Point. Serial number of the device.

monitor-point.description: Generic Monitor Point. Serial number of the device.

baci-property.description: Generic Monitor Point. Protocol revision level.

monitor-point.description: Generic Monitor Point. Protocol revision level.

baci-property.description: Generic Monitor Point. CAN-bus errors since power up and error code of the last error.

monitor-point.description: Generic Monitor Point. CAN-bus errors since power up and error code of the last error.

baci-property.description: Number of CAN errors since last power up or last reset.

monitor-point.description: Number of CAN errors since last power up or last reset.

baci-property.description: Internal slave error code

monitor-point.description: Internal slave error code

baci-property.description: Error code of last CAN error. Codes are those defined by the INTEL 82527 CAN Controller status.

monitor-point.description: Error code of last CAN error. Codes are those defined by the INTEL 82527 CAN Controller status.

baci-property.description: Generic Monitor Point. Number of transactions handled by the slave node since power up.

monitor-point.description: Generic Monitor Point. Number of transactions handled by the slave node since power up.

baci-property.description: Generic Monitor Point. Revision level of the embedded code. This is the software embedded in the AMBSI or the programmable device that is handling the AMB communications.

monitor-point.description: Generic Monitor Point. Revision level of the embedded code. This is the software embedded in the AMBSI or the programmable device that is handling the AMB communications.

baci-property.description: Generic Monitor Point. Temperature measured by the DS1820 chip.

monitor-point.description: Generic Monitor Point. Temperature measured by the DS1820 chip.
